amendment.description: To establish a spending-neutral reserve fund relating to the disposal of certain Federal land.

vote.text: Amendment SA 838 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 49. Record Vote Number: 106.

action.text: Amendment SA 838 proposed by Senator Murkowski. (consideration: CR S1883-1885; text: CR S1883-1884) To establish a spending-neutral reserve fund relating to the disposal of certain Federal land.
